testsuite.name: bank endpoint, should return error message when account number is too

testcase.classname: bank endpoint, should return error message when account number is too
testcase.name: long for bank country code US

failure.message: expected '{"error":"Length of account_number should be between 7 and 11 when bank_country_code is \'US\'"}' to include 'Length of account_number should be between 1 and 17 when bank_country_code is \'US\''

testcase.classname: bank endpoint, should return error message when account number is too
testcase.name: short for bank country code AU

failure.message: expected '{"error":"Length of account_number should be between 7 and 11 when bank_country_code is \'US\'"}' to include 'Length of account_number should be between 6 and 9 when bank_country_code is \'AU\''

testcase.classname: bank endpoint, should return error message when account number is too
testcase.name: long for bank country code AU

failure.message: expected '{"error":"Length of account_number should be between 7 and 11 when bank_country_code is \'US\'"}' to include 'Length of account_number should be between 6 and 9 when bank_country_code is \'AU\''

testcase.classname: bank endpoint, should return error message when account number is too
testcase.name: short for bank country code CN

testcase.name: long for bank country code CN

failure.message: expected '{"error":"Length of account_number should be between 7 and 11 when bank_country_code is \'US\'"}' to include 'Length of account_number should be between 8 and 20 when bank_country_code is \'CN\''
